title: Contenders For Cigar of the Year 2020
itunes:title: Contenders For Cigar of the Year 2020
description:
This Saturday LIVE from the Toscano Cigar Sound Stage at Studio 21 Podcast high above Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH we announced the Contenders for the Cigar of the Year. We count down the cigars that stood out the most in 2020 before putting them to a vote.

As in past years the Contenders are put up for sale and we give you the listener a chance to vote for the cigar of the year. Those votes are tabulated and on December 26th we will announce the winner.

In the first hour we use the Vertigo Hummer to light up the winner of the 2019 Cigar of the Year, Nestor Miranda Special Selection. In the second hour we go back to the 2018 winner as we light up the Aganorsa Leaf Connecticut.

We will have this and all the usual suspects including Versus, Offer of the Day, E-Mail of the Week, Cigar News and a peek into the Asylum. The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH.

Never miss an episode by subscribing to the show via Apple Podcasts and Podbean.
